pullRequest.title: IGNITE-12383 Add distances measures between two vectors
pullRequest.bodyText:
The following measures were added:

Chebyshev distance
Cosine similarity
Minkowski distance
Jaccard index

Testing
Property tests for distance measures (see unit-tests)  is added.
Refactoring
The default implementation for a couple of methods (see DistanceMeasure) is added as well.
To discuss
As Jaccard index and cosine similarity are not actually a distance measure (not all properties of a distance measure are applicable for them) should they implement DistanceMeasure interface?
Question
To implement the Jaccard index I need to calculate intersection. I used HashSet. Is there a more efficient way to compute intersection of two vectors?
@zaleslaw @avplatonov could you take a look?

commit.message: IGNITE-12383 Extract jaccard index to a separate test

+package org.apache.ignite.ml.math.distances;
+
+import org.apache.ignite.ml.math.exceptions.math.CardinalityException;
+import org.apache.ignite.ml.math.primitives.vector.Vector;
+import org.apache.ignite.ml.math.util.MatrixUtil;
+
+/**
+ * Calculates the {@code A * B / (|A| * |B|)} (Cosine similarity) distance between two points.
+ */
+public class CosineSimilarity implements DistanceMeasure {
+
+    /** {@inheritDoc} */
+    @Override
+    public double compute(Vector a, Vector b) throws CardinalityException {
+        return MatrixUtil.localCopyOf(a).dot(b) / (a.kNorm(2d) * b.kNorm(2d));
+    }
+
